work.name: METRO Global Solution Center
highlights: Designed and maintained scalable ETL pipelines using Apache Airflow and dbt
Migrated over 45 TB of e-commerce data across Salesforce, GCP BigQuery, and Odoo with 100% accuracy
Developed over 20 automated DAGs to orchestrate data workflows, improving performance by 40% and reducing failures by 15%
Built scalable APIs using Apigee/API Gateway and Cloud Functions to securely deliver processed BigQuery data
Mentored new hires on Airflow, dbt, and core data engineering practices

work.name: Eviden (an Atos Company)
highlights: Orchestrated scalable batch workflows with Azure Data Factory, enabling efficient data movement between sources, ADLS Gen2, and Databricks
Managed and built end-to-end data workflows across two business lines, with orchestration implemented using Apache Airflow DAGs
Optimized ADLS Gen2 data storage through partitioning, reducing retrieval times by 40%
Migrated healthcare data from Teradata to BigQuery and performed extensive SQL-based validation and debugging against legacy systems with 100% data accuracy
Optimized BigQuery query performance for faster execution

work.name: Playo
highlights: Built and maintained scalable ETL pipelines for e-commerce data, ingesting data into AWS S3 and loading curated datasets into Amazon Redshift using Spark-based batch processing
Designed customer segmentation datasets within an analytics warehouse, transforming user and transaction data to help marketing teams target high-value cohorts and boost campaign efficiency
Enabled dashboarding and reporting by delivering well-modeled, optimized datasets from Redshift to BI tools, reducing dashboard query latency by ~25%
Collaborated cross-functionally with analytics, product, and business teams to align data models, pipelines, and reporting requirements

work.name: Dairy Business
highlights: Managed daily operations and P&L for the family-run dairy business, strengthening stakeholder management skills
Led sales and inventory management initiatives, enhancing brand presence

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
